items.content_html: MiniView is a web app that enables a pop-up mini player to capture a window while you continue working in another. It enhances multitasking by allowing you to view content in a compact, accessible format, without interrupting your workflow. The app is lightweight and simple to use, improving productivity.
items.title: Wasif-Ansari/MiniView: MiniView is a web app that enables a pop-up mini player to capture a window while you continue working in another. It enhances multitasking by allowing you to view content in a compact, accessible format, without interrupting your workflow. The app is lightweight and simple to use, improving productivity.
